1: @@//byed <mistake>do//sangs</mistake> rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis kyang lus dang <mistake>ngag</mistake> dang yid kyi rgyud la yang dag par byin gyis rlob par byed <mistake>do//sangs</mistake>
2: rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rjes su 'dzin <mistake>pas</mistake> kyang rjes su <mistake>'djin</mistake> par byed <mistake>do //chos</mistake> thams <mistake>cadg</mistake> la mi 'jigs pa'i <mistake>sbobs</mistake> pa yang nye bar bsgrub par byed <mistake>do// dgra</mistake>
3: <mistake>/bcom</mistake> pa dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i chos la sdug pa'i <mistake>sm</mistake> pa nyid kyis bdag gi dngos po yang nye bar ston par byed do // gdul dga' ba 'dul ba <mistake>po</mistake>
4: rnams kyang <mistake>kho</mistake> <mistake>bo'i</mistake> rgyal po chen po <mistake>dang/ rdo</mistake> rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa 'gro ba <mistake>yong su</mistake> <mistake>skyob</mistake> par gyur pa gzugs sna <mistake>tshogs</mistake> pa'i <mistake>sphul</mistake> pa'i <mistake>sku</mistake> rnams kyis ma dangs dang stobs dang gzi
5: brjid <mistake>zril</mistake> gyis mi gnon ba nyid dang / sngags dang phyag rgya <mistake>dang</mistake> mngon par rtogs pa dang dkyil 'khor rnams nye bar ston par byed <mistake>do//sngags</mistake> dang rig pa'i rgyal po ma lus pa <mistake>dang/ bgegs</mistake>
6: dang log 'dren dang bdung dang dgra phyir rgol ba dang <mistake>gzhan</mistake> gyis mi thub pa chen <mistake>po</mistake> thams cad <mistake>kyang/ mtshan</mistake> mo dang nyin mor bcas par skad cig so sor spyod lam dang lam rnams su yang <mistake>bsrung</mistake>
7: ba dang bskyab pa <mistake>dang/sbed</mistake> pa byed <mistake>do //tshangs</mistake> pa dang dbang po dang / nye dbang po <mistake>dang/drag</mistake> <mistake>o</mistake> <mistake>dang/sred</mistake> med kyi bu <mistake>dang/kun</mistake> 'gyed gzhon nu <mistake>dang /dbang</mistake> phyug chen po <mistake>dang/ smin</mistake> drug gi bu <mistake>dang/</mistake>
8: nag po chen po <mistake>dang /dga'</mistake> byed dbang <mistake>phyag</mistake> <mistake>dang/gshin</mistake> rje <mistake>dang/chu</mistake> <mistake>lha</mistake> dang / lus ngan <mistake>dang/'phrog</mistake> ma <mistake>dang/phyogs</mistake> <mistake>bcu'i</mistake> 'jig rten skyong ba gang yin pa de rnams thams cad kyang <mistake>tag</mistake> <mistake>par/</mistake>
